title: cannot open .ksp files Xamarin.forms
body:
When I try open .ksp files on Xamarin.forms I get message that indicates skiasharp.forms.views.skcanvasview cannot be converted to skcanvas.

Trying to create an iPad version of kimono designer and the kimono.core is using skcanvas however the skiasharp.forms.views are using skcanvasview

please help

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
The `SKCanvasView` is the UI element that is visible. The `SKCanvas` is the code type that has the various drawing methods.

What you might want to do is add the `SKCanvasView` to your UI, and then in the `PaintSurface` event, use `e.Surface.Canvas` to draw onto that view via `SKCanvas` methods.

comments.author: Redth
comments.body: We are closing this issue since no response was received.  Please open a new issue referring to this one if you have more information.
